blurb: Two rival executives are forced to work together on a merger, constantly clashing until they realize their competition masks deeper feelings.
Agent Smith must recover the stolen nuclear codes from a foreign operative without being detected by enemy intelligence.
The decaying mansion holds dark secrets as the new heir discovers the tragic history of her ancestors haunting the corridors.
In a neon-lit dystopian city, a hacker falls in love with an AI consciousness while fighting corporate control.
The lawyer must navigate courtroom drama and uncover the truth behind the murder before an innocent person is convicted.
Learn how to bake the perfect sourdough bread with this step-by-step guide including kneading techniques and fermentation tips.
After years apart, childhood sweethearts reunite in their hometown and must confront the painful past that drove them apart.
A physicist discovers a method for faster-than-light travel but must deal with the scientific and ethical implications of causality violation.
A masked killer stalks teenagers at a remote summer camp, picking them off one by one in increasingly brutal ways.
A comprehensive guide to personal finance, covering budgeting strategies, investment basics, and retirement planning for beginners.
